i really really need to remove all parts of this code relating to firebase and its function without breaking the code for the other functions. i am NOT USING FIREBASE in my project and hence want to remove it from this code. please lets parse line by line and output the remaining code not belonging to firebase, so that remaining code can be used. it is important you are meticulous with the parsing and linting. also remove comment that will not break the code too such as those that are not important to general code function. also focus on the code you are given. once you finish i will provide another block of code for you to do the same. making sure to remove firebase functionality without effecting or breaking  other functions:
